Homepage.vision_content: To become a leading vocational institution that produces highly qualified, innovative graduates with expertise and skills that meet the needs of national and global industries.
Homepage.vision_description: This vision serves as the foundation for every step of the institution’s development, fostering a spirit of professionalism and innovation to be able to compete in the global era.

mission_content.content: 1. Providing high-quality training based on national and international industry standards to create skilled and competent workforce.
2. Developing practice-based training programs with a hands-on approach and direct experience in the tourism and creative economy industries.
3. Building strategic partnerships with the tourism industry, hotels, restaurants, and travel agencies to expand job opportunities for graduates.
4. Encouraging innovation and entrepreneurship in the tourism sector by equipping trainees with business and digital skills.
5. Instilling ethical values, hospitality, and professionalism as the main foundation in building a superior workforce in the tourism sector.
6. Supporting sustainable tourism development by teaching environmentally friendly practices based on local culture.

about_content:
Rising International College (RIC) Bali is a job training institution under the auspices of the Tridaya Santana Loka Foundation.

Established on May 2, 2025, RIC Bali is committed to producing young generations who are skilled, innovative, and ready to compete in the professional world, especially in the tourism, hospitality, and creative economy sectors.

With the support of professional instructors and practice-based learning, RIC Bali is determined to become a leading vocational institution that makes a real contribution to the advancement of education in Indonesia.
Homepage.cabang_description: RIC Bali has two branches ready to serve education and training needs in the tourism sector with complete facilities and easy access.

programs.sectionDescription: RIC Bali Jembrana offers <basic>Basic Level (D1)</basic> and <middle>Middle Level (D2)</middle> programs to prepare participants to become job-ready professionals in the hospitality and tourism industry.

housekeeping.title: Housekeeping
housekeeping.description: Basic training in cleanliness management, room arrangement, and room service according to hospitality industry standards.

fb_service.title: F&B Service
fb_service.description: Learning professional food and beverage service techniques following international standards.

culinary.title: Culinary
culinary.description: Practical training in modern and traditional cooking, and mastering kitchen operation based on global culinary industry standards.

room_division.title: Room Division (Housekeeping & Front Office)
room_division.description: A D2 level program combining Housekeeping and Front Office competencies to prepare professionals for hotel room divisions.

fb_division.title: F&B Division (F&B Service & Culinary)
fb_division.description: A D2 program integrating food & beverage service expertise and professional cooking skills for the hospitality industry.

About.history_description: Rising International College (RIC) was established under the Tridaya Santana Loka Foundation, founded on April 25, 2025. This institution was created as a commitment to improving the quality of vocational education in Indonesia, particularly in the tourism and hospitality sectors. With the support of professional instructors and strategic partnerships with industry, RIC Bali is ready to become a leading training institution that produces competent and work-ready graduates who can compete at both national and international levels.
